version_description:
Add - Files (Audio Input System)

-Use Files app on iOS11
Put the music files in
Locations - On My iOS - STAELLA folder.

-or Use iTunes File Sharing on PC/Mac
Put in STAELLA Documents.

Support formats
.mp3 .m4a .ogg .wav .aiff .aif .it .mod .s3m .xm

Add - Dummy (Audio Input System)
- Animation System. Not Sync Music.
- You can use Music app in Background.

Add - Noir Slider

Fix- Audio Input

New Visual Effects Package “TERRA”
Added new 8 Visual Effects

Add - Wallpaper
You can Select Background Image from your Photo Library.

Add - Visual Shuffle Select mode
Long press the visual effect icon to display the check box.

Add - Visual effect customize
Double-Tap the visual effect icon.

Add - Title display of the new style.

Fix - Reduce loading time of iTunes songs
Added a function to read the next song in the background while playing the song.

Fix - The sound now sounds even in silent mode.

Add - Color
You can customize the color.

Fixed
- While using Dummy, stop playing other music.
- While using Microphone, stop playing other music.
- Purchase item not be displayed.

New - STAELLA pro
Include - Recorder, 10 Screen Effects, 10 Wallpaper Blend Modes

Add - Recorder //pro//
Operable while recording.
UI not record.

Please bug report send to support form.
http://bit.ly/monocroform

Add - Screen Effects //pro//
Slip, Glitch, Distortion, Noise, LightLeak, Vignette, Mirror, Angle, Rain, Hexagon
Can Mix Effects in RealTime.
Tap knob to return to default.

Add - Wallpaper Blend Mode //pro//
Screen, Linear Dodge, Overlay, Pin Light, Soft Light,
Hard Light, Hard Mix, Color Dodge, Exclusion, Subtract.

Add - Contrast, Hue to Color

fix - minor bugs

Add - New Animation Types in Dummy(AudioInput)

Fix - iTunes, Microphone, Wallpaper

Add - Multilingual support
English, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, Russian, French, German

- Added support for iOS13.

- Title & Artist Text is now reflected in the video recorder.
- Removed GIF from video recorder to make it easier to understand.
    I will return it if there is a person who needs it.
